channel.title: OnOptions
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from OnOptions, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.description: Not everyone is going to see your vision as quickly as you do, and that’s okay.

item.title: World leaders at UN shocked by ‘macabre response’ on social media to Charlie Kirk’s death

item.title: Gen Z’s hiring nightmare is really about discrimination. ‘Youngism’ is worse than AI when it comes to eating entry-level jobs
item.description: In the U.S., federal age-bias protections under the Age Discrimination in Employment Act begin at 40, which leaves Gen Z in a legal blind spot.
